sentences.english: All aliens have to fill out this form.
sentences.chinese: 所有外侨都必须填写这个表格。

sentences.english: I need you to get a copy of that new alien alert from the Immigration Department.
sentences.chinese: 我要你从移民局搞一份最新的外侨警报。

sentences.english: Foreign entrepreneurs and overseas Chinese are welcome to invest in Huangshan.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎各国企业家，海外侨胞来黄山投资。

sentences.english: One photocopy of the front and back of the Alien Resident Certificate.
sentences.chinese: 外侨居留证正反面影本各乙份。

sentences.english: Let's say that on December 20 you were to meet a friendly space alien.
sentences.chinese: 让我们说，在本月20日，你被满足的友好空间外侨。

sentences.english: All aliens must register annually with the Department of Immigration.
sentences.chinese: 所有外侨每年都必须到移民局登记。

sentences.english: What's your Alien Resident Certificate number?
sentences.chinese: 你的外侨居住证件号码是多少？

sentences.english: Immigrant workers were classed as resident aliens.
sentences.chinese: 移民来的工人已归入外侨类。
杰克是一个机灵的外侨。

sentences.english: Foreign broadcasts in expatriate communities were suspended for the days of mourning.
sentences.chinese: 所有面向海外侨胞团体广播均在哀悼期间暂停。

sentences.english: This has helped to affect the enthusiasm of overseas Chinese communities' in building their homeland.
sentences.chinese: 这些都挫伤了海外侨胞侨团建设家乡的积极性。

sentences.english: The Overseas Chinese made outstanding contributions to Chinas war of resistance.
sentences.chinese: 海外侨胞为祖国抗战作出了突出的贡献。

definition: foreign concession, an enclave occupied by a foreign power (in China in the 19th and 20th centuries)
overseas Chinese/(in a restricted sense) Chinese emigrant who still retains Chinese nationality/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
to live far away from one's native place/to reside in a foreign country
(old) police station in a foreign concession 租界[zu1 jie4]
Westerner employed in Qing China (as professor or military advisor etc)
Chinese person who returns to China after living as an expatriate
Nationalist government 1920s-1949 under Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
family members of nationals residing abroad
